name: X-human
description:
X-human - An interactive narrative about the complexity of information and the impossible struggle to make sense of it. 

Welcome and thank you for trying out our game prototype!

It is merely an idea to address the complexity and vast amount of information that surrounds us. 

Here you can read about the idea and our concept and check out our design process:) https://docs.google.com/document/d/187i4EamR2qQDFNtNLBdgWe3ULTn225OUEVc6Ea1Et2Y/...

👉👉And here you find the game concept in case it doesn't run on itch.io : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_7y4R0vQynOjopJsDsdNwcsJI9oAZ4pk?usp=sha...

Have a good day,

Zs and B
